snippet.title: Sker Ritual - Episode 3 Teaser - Sewers of the Dead
snippet.description:
Episode 3 coming 8 March on Steam Early Access! Play now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1492070/?utm_source=youtube&utm_campaign=episode-3-tease

Delve into the Sewers of the Dead, the Sker Island underground lair and home of The Stranger. Navigate through tunnels of infestation where the Quiet Ones are not your only enemy here. Watch where you step as The Stranger's mischief of rats are under the control of his glaring eyes. 

The round-based co-op survival FPS and spiritual successor to the award-winning occult horror, Maid of Sker. Play solo or up to 4 players to survive the supernatural onslaught of the Quiet Ones.

Follow Wales Interactive:

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/publisher/WalesInteractive
Twitter: https://twitter.com/WalesInter
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@walesinteractiveofficial
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/WalesInteractive
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/walesinteractive
Wales Interactive: https://www.walesinteractive.com
Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/walesinteractive

#SkerRitual #FPS #Coop
